item.title: Windows Container Internals - Prep
item.content:
I would like to kick off a step-by-step series that takes us through the journey of understanding the internals of Windows Containers. Notice I say us because it is a journey that I’m also taking.

Before we begin the journey, let’s get a few things out of the way:

// TBD

item.title: About
item.description: About Join us on a life-long journey into understanding the internals of systems. We will mainly be focusing around the Windows and Linux internals, but not limited to that. If you would like to contribute to the blog, feel free to open a PR here with the content in markdown.
item.content:
About

Join us on a life-long journey into understanding the internals of systems. We will mainly be focusing around the Windows and Linux internals, but not limited to that.

If you would like to contribute to the blog, feel free to open a PR here with the content in markdown.
